## Shape.LowerRightColumn property

Represents lower right corner column index.

```csharp
public int LowerRightColumn { get; set; }
```

### Examples

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.LowerRightColumn == 3)
    shape.LowerRightColumn = 1;
```
